namespaceSummaries.CppSharp: Contains core types related to platform, toolchains and diagnotics.
namespaceSummaries.CppSharp.AST: Contains all the AST (Abstract Syntax Tree) related types.
namespaceSummaries.CppSharp.Parser: Contains the code parsing APIs, Clang bindings and native AST conversion code.
namespaceSummaries.CppSharp.Runtime: Contains runtime support code used by the .NET bindings.
